title: Drought In Calif. Creates Water Wars Between Farmers, Developers, Residents
teaser: Fresno native Mark Arax has written about the war over water in his state for decades. "It used to be the farmers against the delta smelt fish, and now it's the urbanite against the almond," he says.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
